member.name: T:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainText.Driver
member.summary: Driver class for the ExportTerrainText plug-in.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainText.Driver.WriteText
member.summary: Writes the text data to the chosen file in the SaveFileDialog.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainText.Driver.WriteTerrainPageData(System.IO.StreamWriter@)
member.summary: Writes the TerrainPage data to the output stream.
member.param: The output stream to write data to.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainText.Driver.WriteTerrainPatchHeaderData(System.IO.StreamWriter@)
member.summary: Writes the TerrainPatch header data to the output stream.
member.param: The output stream to write data to.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainText.Driver.WriteTerrainPatchTextureData(System.IO.StreamWriter@)
member.summary: Writes the TerrainPatch texture data to the output stream.
member.param: The output stream to write data to.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.ExportTerrainText.Driver.WriteTerrainPatchVertexData(System.IO.StreamWriter@)
member.summary: Writes the TerrainPatch vertex data to the output stream.
member.param: The output stream to write data to.
